Pre-Game Insights: The Thunder are on an 8-game win streak heading into the game.
The Knicks are 13-6 on the road entering the matchup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marks the 100th meeting between the Thunder and the Knicks.
Others: The Thunder have a strong home record (15-2), while the Knicks are ninth in the NBA with 28.0 assists per game led by Jalen Brunson averaging 7.7.
The Thunder average 115.4 points per game, 5.8 more than the Knicks allow (109.6).
